summary: Craftable light armor divine amulets free from there enchantments. Craftable light armor circlets and a ring.
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod based around a female character I was building. I was looking for a patical look as we all do. I wanted that necklace and this robe to reach the look I wanted. Unfortunately the necklace I liked didn't suit my characters class. Presto change-o , Jewelery Revamped.

===========================================================================================

Necklace Features

You can now craft all nine divine amulets free from there enchantments at the blacksmithing forge. The necromancer amulet, ancient nord amulet and elder council amulet have also been added. I also added one jeweled quicksilver necklace and one normal silver necklace for raw material ingredients purposes.

===========================================================================================

Necklace Light Armor Features

Thirteen necklaces now have armor value and can be improved at the work bench all the way up to legendary.

===========================================================================================

Ring Light Armor Features

For now I just added one ring, a quicksilver ruby ring with the same armor value as the necklaces. You can improve it and enchant it aswell.

===========================================================================================

Circlet Light Armor Features

Two circlets added, the armor value are slightly better then the necklaces and ring. The armor value is equivalent to a leather helm. You can improve it and enchant them aswell.

===========================================================================================

How it all works and what perks you need

I wanted to keep it simple here. All that is required is the steelsmithing perk and a goldsmithing kit. Under the misc section at the blacksmithing forge you will find the kit. Keep the kit in your inventory.

===========================================================================================

Small Tip

To make a necklace look right on female models, reduce the weight settings. You can do this with the console commands. player.setnpcweight <value between 0-100

It all depends on what type of clothing is on. Play around with it, console commands are your friend.

Check out my other mods, please endorse and send me feedback.
